topics.body: True story. I was driving back home from my parents house, when in the middle of the road I see a weird stick shaped thing. It was a Black Snake. I stop the car, get out, and go check on the little dude. After I confirmed that he was in fact alive, I grabbed him by the tail and head and carried him to the side of the road so he didn't get run over.
